skillSets.name: Signal
skillSets.description: Does the referee correctly demonstrate the following signals during a game, or when asked? Correctly means: clear and correct with crisp delivery, given with authority, correct stance and posture and performed mainly on the run to indicate the mark quickly. Note: if not demonstrated on-field, test the referee off-field after the game.
